price: او الله سره بل معبود مه ګرځوئ، زه دهغه له خوا تاسو ته يو ښكاره وېروونكى يم.
arabic: وَلَا تَجۡعَلُواْ مَعَ ٱللَّهِ إِلَٰهًا ءَاخَرَۖ إِنِّي لَكُم مِّنۡهُ نَذِيرٞ مُّبِينٞ

version.title: Pashto Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into Pashto language, translated by the team of the Rowad Translation Center in cooperation with IslamHouse.com.

meta.transliteration: walā tajʿalū maʿa al-lahi ilāhan ākhara innī lakum min'hu nadhīrun mubīnun
